import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; const ShopingCart = ({ dataCart, onRemoveCart }) => { const onHandSubmit = (id) => { onRemoveCart(id); } const total = () => { const totalPrice = 0; dataCart.forEach((item, index) => { totalPrice += item.price * item.quantity }) console.log(totalPrice); } total(); return (
